overview: The "black sheep" son of a wealthy family meets a young psychiatric patient who's been raised in isolation her entire life. He takes the naive young woman home for his brother's wedding an improbable romance blooms, as she impresses everyone with her genuine, simple charms.
tagline: She's stepping out into the world.
cast: Evan Rachel Wood|Scott Speedman|J.K. Simmons|Treat Williams|Kate Burton
